product.title: ASUS ROG Strix G18 (2025) Gaming Laptop, 18" 2.5K 240Hz 16:10 Display Laptop, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080, Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX, 64GB DDR5 RAM, 2TB M.2 PCIe SSD, WiFi 7, Win11 Pro - Eclipse Gray

protection_plans.title: Complete Protect: One plan covers all eligible past and future purchases (Renews Monthly Until Cancelled)

product.categories_flat: Electronics > Computers & Accessories > Computers & Tablets > Laptops > Traditional Laptops
product.description:
Dominate easily, wielding ultimate power in anything you do with your ROG Strix G18 SUPER laptop! ROG Strix G18 easily handles even the most demanding games or business tasks.

Unlock a next-level gaming experience with the ROG Strix G18. Featuring a 2.5K 240Hz Nebula Display with Pantone-validated color accuracy, it delivers stunning visuals. Powered by an Intel Core processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 laptop GPU, enjoy seamless gaming and creative performance. With Up to 64GB DDR5 RAM and 8TB PCIe 4.0 SSD, and advanced ROG Intelligent Cooling, stay at the top of your game. The esports-ready keyboard, Dolby Atmos audio, and customizable RGB Aura Light Bar elevate every moment.









Brand: ASUS

Series: ASUS ROG Strix G18 Gaming Laptop

Operating System: Windows 11 Pro

Color: Eclipse Gray






Processor Brand: Intel

Processor: Intel Core Ultra 9 275HX

Processor Core: 24-Core

Processor Thread: 24 threads

Processor Speed: Up to 5.4 GHz

Cache: 36 MB Intel Smart Cache

Total L2 Cache: 40 MB

Intel Deep Learning Boost (Intel DL Boost) on CPU: YES

AI Software Frameworks Supported by CPU: OpenVINO, WindowsML, DirectML, ONNX RT, WebNN

CPU Lithography: TSMC N3B









Graphics Brand: NVIDIA

Graphics Type: Dedicated

Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 16 GB GDDR7

ROG Boost: 1550MHz* at 175W (1500MHz Boost Clock+50MHz OC, 150W+25W Dynamic Boost)

NVIDIA DLSS: DLSS 4 (Deep Learning Super Sampling), Ray tracing









Screen Size: 18 inches

Screen Resolution: ROG Nebula 2.5K, 2560 x 1600 (QHD), 16:10

Refresh Rate: 240Hz / 3ms

Display: G-SYNC (NVIDIA Adaptive Sync)

Display Screen Type: IPS-level, Anti-Glare Display

DCI-P3:100% Pantone Validated

Support Dolby Vision HDR :Yes









Memory Type (RAM): DDR5

Memory：Up to 64GB DDR5 RAM

Storage Type: PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD

Hard Drive: Up to 8 TB SSD











Keyboard: Backlit Chiclet Keyboard 4-Zone RGB

Camera: 1080P FHD IR Camera for Windows Hello

Audio Technology: Hi-Res Audio with Dolby Atmos and Two-Way AI Noise Cancellation

Wireless Connectivity: Wi-Fi 7(802.11be) (Triple band) 2*2+Bluetooth 5.4 Wireless Card















Ports & Slots:

1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack

1x HDMI 2.1 FRL

3x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A (data speed up to 10Gbps)

1x 2.5G LAN port

2x Thunderbolt™ 5 with support for DisplayPort™ / power delivery / G-SYNC (data speed up to 120Gbps)



Dimensions (W x L x H): 15.71 x 11.73 x 1.26 Inches

Weight: 7.05 pounds






Statement: Original Seal is opened for upgrade ONLY. If the computer has modifications, then the manufacturer box is opened for it to be tested and inspected and to install the upgrades to achieve the specifications as advertised.
feature_bullets: Premium Performance: This ROG Strix G18 is powered by the Intel Ultra 9 275HX processor with 24 cores (8 Performance + 16 Efficient) and 24 total threads, boosting up to 5.4 GHz. This next-gen CPU excels in gaming and creative tasks with AI acceleration for faster rendering, offering unbeatable speed and performance, whether you're gaming, streaming, or editing.

Next-Gen Stunning Graphics: With the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5080 16GB of GDDR7 Graphics video memory delivers stunning gaming performance. With features like DLSS 4, Ray Tracing, and Frame Generation, it ensures smooth gameplay and high frame rates. Advanced Optimus technology optimizes battery life and performance by dynamically switching between the iGPU and dGPU, keeping you ahead of the competition.

ROG Nebula Display: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals for gaming, content creation, and entertainment with the ultra-fast 18" 2.5K 16:10 2560x1600 240Hz Nebula Display. Pantone validation guarantees professional-grade color accuracy with 100% DCI-P3 coverage, further enhanced by a new ACR film that boosts contrast and minimizes glare.

Expansive Storage: Dominate any game with Up to 64GB of blazing-fast DDR5 5600MHz RAM. Enjoy smooth gameplay, faster loading times, and seamless multitasking. Load games and projects instantly with Up to 8TB PCIe Gen 4 storage, delivering up to 7,000MB/s throughput and efficient cooling. Stay ahead with PCIe Gen 5-ready SSD slots, ensuring easy upgrades and future-proof performance.

State-Of-The-Art ROG Intelligent Cooling: Maintain peak performance with ROG Intelligent Cooling. Equipped with an end-to-end vapor chamber, Tri-Fan technology, and Conductonaut Extreme liquid metal, this cutting-edge thermal design ensures your system stays cool and quiet, delivering sustained high-frame-rate gameplay.

This next-gen CPU excels in gaming and creative tasks with AI acceleration for faster rendering, offering unbeatable speed and performance, whether you're gaming, streaming, or editing.

top_reviews.title: omg omg I love it
top_reviews.body: I have had this lap top since may of this year best purchase I have made laptop wise I run path of titans, escape from tarkov, call of duty, starship troopers, elden ring, and mine craft without any problems Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I have had this lap top since may of this year best purchase I have made laptop wise I run path of titans, escape from tarkov, call of duty, starship troopers, elden ring, and mine craft without any problems
Read more

date.raw: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023

top_reviews.title: Black screen of death after 2 days of use
top_reviews.body: The laptop itself is beefy and very good but after a few days of using it it just stopped showing a display screen and I had to return it I have no idea what happened but I hope it's all fixed when I get the new laptop  Edit:Laptop arrived and it's been a few moths since and it's been such a good buy that's why I gave four instead of 2 stars I highly recommend as it has great performance for a laptop and it's very smooth. Just for reference it can run ark survival evolved max settings at 100 fps average and peaking at 150fps Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
The laptop itself is beefy and very good but after a few days of using it it just stopped showing a display screen and I had to return it I have no idea what happened but I hope it's all fixed when I get the new laptop

Edit:Laptop arrived and it's been a few moths since and it's been such a good buy that's why I gave four instead of 2 stars I highly recommend as it has great performance for a laptop and it's very smooth. Just for reference it can run ark survival evolved max settings at 100 fps average and peaking at 150fps
Read more
